kallak_writing.soon_come: Soon he will come for me.

tree.something_special: But no, something special for you...
tree.warning: But I shall give fair warning.

kallak_malcolm.heard_escape: I heard yesterday of your escape.
kallak_malcolm.expected: And have expected you before now.
kallak_malcolm.puny_curse: Your puny curse restrains me naught.
kallak_malcolm.mean_harm: I mean to harm you, have no doubt...
kallak_malcolm.no_tears: I shed no tears for Kyrandia...
